abstract: Wherever one stands on the meaning or significance of the Oct. 7 attacks by the Haqqani network on American-Afghan outposts, two young enlisted soldiers in a bunker appeared to have stopped the crucial component of the attack.
snippet: Wherever one stands on the meaning or significance of the Oct. 7 attacks by the Haqqani network on American-Afghan outposts, two young enlisted soldiers in a bunker appeared to have stopped the crucial component of the attack.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: FORWARD OPERATING BASE ORGUN-E, Afghanistan - Last Friday, on the 10th anniversary of the start of the Afghan war, at least several dozen fighters from the Haqqani insurgent network launched a complex attack against multiple American-Afghan outposts near the Pakistan border.

headline.main: A Closer Look at the Haqqani Anniversary Attack on American-Afghan Outposts
